inclusion.criterion: study participant will be asked to fill out the STAI questionnaire prior to placement of the labor epidural catheter
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: study participant will then complete the pre procedure questionnaire
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: study participant will be asked to fill out the STAI questionnaire again after completion of the neuraxial procedure
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: parturients are receiving neuraxial anesthesia for a cesarean delivery
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has abdominal pain lasting about 4 days accompanied by nausea and 2 episodes of vomiting. She has a history of hypercholesterolemia and two C/sections.
